sense.name: lifeless state, decease
sense.examples: her death came as a terrible shock Slow poisoning by arsenic leads to a painful death. he seemed more content in death than he had ever been in life 'til death do us part'. The climbers froze to death on the side of the mountain. His negligence resulted in the deaths of hundreds of innocent people.

sense.name: ending or destruction of some abstract thing or process
sense.examples: It spelled death for the arms treaty when the delegates walked out. The rise of the automobile was the death of the horse and buggy.

sense.name: imaginary being, personification of the process of death.
sense.commentary: (usually capitalized, does not occur with determiners or in plural form)
sense.examples: Death Takes a Holiday. He worked hard to keep death from his doorstep.
